document.full_text: networking giant cisco systems inc is offering some employees incentives to retire early as part of an ongoing effort to revive a company that chief executive officer john chambers has said has lost its way.
document.title: cisco offers early retirement as it revamps
lines_and_colors: networking giant cisco systems inc is offering some employees incentives to retire early as part of an ongoing effort to revive a company that chief executive officer john chambers has said has lost its way.
